engine

Class Centrality

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.Centrality

  •  class Centrality
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides implementations of the various centrality measures of the Graph Toolkit, including betweeness cetnrality and PageRank.

      private Centrality()

      Calculates the betweeness centrality for each node using Brandes' algorithm.

      Adjusts the values in the given matrix according to the formula for the dampened PageRank algorithm

      Method for returning the adjacency matrix for a given set of Nodes

      Method for getting the normalized Vector of a given Vector, such that the sum of all elements is 1.
      private static org.la4j.Vector getPrincipalEV(org.la4j.Matrix adjMatrix)
      Uses the EigenDecompositor class from package la4j to find the principal eigenvector, which corresponds to the largest eigenvector of the supplied matrix.

      Find the Eigenvector Centrality of a graph using the dampened PageRank formula

      • btwCentrality

        static java.util.Map<Node,java.lang.Double> btwCentrality(Graph g)
        Calculates the betweeness centrality for each node using Brandes' algorithm.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graph whose values should be calculated
        Returns:
        a map containing the betweeness centrality values

        static void commDetection(Graph g)

      • pageRank

        static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> pageRank(Graph g)
        Find the Eigenvector Centrality of a graph using the dampened PageRank formula
        Parameters:
        g - the graph to run PageRank on
        Returns:
        a map from node id to rank

      • getPrincipalEV

        private static org.la4j.Vector getPrincipalEV(org.la4j.Matrix adjMatrix)
        Uses the EigenDecompositor class from package la4j to find the principal eigenvector, which corresponds to the largest eigenvector of the supplied matrix.
        Parameters:
        adjMatrix - an adjacency matrix for a graph
        Returns:
        the principal eigenvector of adjMatrix

      • getNormalizedVector

        private static org.la4j.Vector getNormalizedVector(org.la4j.Vector v)
        Method for getting the normalized Vector of a given Vector, such that the sum of all elements is 1.
        Parameters:
        v - the Vector to normalize
        Returns:
        the normalized Vector

      • dampenMatrix

        private static void dampenMatrix(double DF,
                org.la4j.Matrix adjMatrix)
        Adjusts the values in the given matrix according to the formula for the dampened PageRank algorithm
        Parameters:
        DF - the damping factor (default 0.85)
        adjMatrix - the matrix whose contents should be modified

      • getAdjMat

        private static org.la4j.Matrix getAdjMat(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> idMap,
                        java.util.Set<Node> nodes)
        Method for returning the adjacency matrix for a given set of Nodes
        Parameters:
        idMap - the mapping from integers to Node IDs
        nodes - the set of Nodes from which the matrix should be made
        Returns:
        the adjacency matrix in Matrix form from package la4j
